attributes.title: The Final Sudden Death - #226
attributes.caption: That's right, we're saying goodbye to our post show the only way we know how, by listening to Chad talk about how much it sucks to have children.
attributes.description: That's right, we're saying goodbye to our post show the only way we know how, by listening to Chad talk about how much it sucks to have children. Also we talk about Tucker Carlson and how he is and absolute trash bag of a person, I would call him the C word but I don't think I can do that in the metadata. Anyways, if you're still reading this thanks for watching all the post show stuff, maybe we'll bring it back one day when we aren't so busy. xoxoxo
